function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases in the hospitality sector due to job losses among immigrants.","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission in the hospitality sector and potential impact on public health.","Mitigation":"Implement strict health and safety protocols, provide support for affected workers, and encourage vaccination among the immigrant workforce.","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, health monitoring technologies, and vaccination management systems.","People":"Immigrant workers, customers in the hospitality sector, and the general public.","Owner":"Employers in the hospitality sector, public health authorities, and government agencies."},{"Description":"Differential impact of job retention schemes on immigrant workers, leading to potential overrepresentation in certain sectors.","Impact":"Unequal distribution of job retention benefits and potential clustering of immigrant workers in specific industries, increasing the risk of disease transmission in those sectors.","Mitigation":"Ensure fair and equal access to job retention schemes for all workers, monitor sector-specific distribution of participants, and provide additional support for at-risk sectors.","Technologies":"Data analytics for scheme participation monitoring, digital platforms for equitable scheme access, and communication tools for targeted support.","People":"Immigrant workers, employers utilizing job retention schemes, and government agencies responsible for scheme implementation.","Owner":"Government agencies responsible for job retention schemes and employers utilizing the schemes."},{"Description":"Lack of differentiation in job retention schemes by nationality or country of birth, potentially leading to concentrated impact on immigrant workers in specific sectors.","Impact":"Potential clustering of immigrant workers in sectors with limited job retention support, increasing the risk of transmission and impacting the health of immigrant communities.","Mitigation":"Implement targeted support for sectors with high immigrant workforce representation, incorporate diversity awareness in scheme implementation, and provide cultural competence training for scheme administrators.","Technologies":"Diversity mapping tools, cultural competence training platforms, and communication apps for immigrant community engagement.","People":"Immigrant workers, employers in sectors with high immigrant representation, and government agencies responsible for scheme implementation.","Owner":"Government agencies responsible for job retention schemes, employers in immigrant-majority sectors, and community organizations representing immigrant workers."}]}
